dc:title: Be Kind, Cain
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: An apologia for their work in response to a letter questioning their efficacy. She emphasizes strong faith, withholding judgment of the poor, country living, removing fears and the value of indoctrination. Says, "God is love, and perfect love casts out fear."
